messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My Pokémon grew up in the arms of
Mother Nature. They’re tough!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
How could you be tougher than
Mother Nature?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Most of the time, my Pokémon return
to their Poké Balls right away.But sometimes, they just fall asleep
on top of my head. That gets messy.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
The desire to win... That should be
evident in every Trainer!
